title: Quality Checks
description: Ensure your prompt outputs meet your standards

emptyState.title: No check selected
emptyState.description: Select a quality check from the list to view or edit it

list.title: Quality Checks
list.createFirst: Add quality checks to ensure your prompts meet your standards

create.title: Add Quality Check
create.descriptionPlaceholder: What does this check look for?
create.typeLabel: What would you like to check?

assertion.label: Quick Check
assertion.description: Instant, free checks for words, phrases, length, or format

llm_judge.label: AI Review
llm_judge.description: Intelligent review for tone, quality, completeness, or custom criteria

contains.label: Check for words or phrases
contains.description: Ensure specific content appears or doesn't appear

length.label: Check response length
length.description: Verify minimum or maximum character count

format.label: Validate format
format.description: Check for valid JSON or regex patterns

tone.label: Evaluate tone
tone.description: Review for professional, friendly, or custom tone

detail.deleteWarning: This will also remove it from all prompts using it.

summary.max_length: Checks that response is at most {{value}} characters
summary.min_length: Checks that response is at least {{value}} characters
summary.regex: Checks if response matches the pattern
summary.json_valid: Checks that response is valid JSON
summary.llm_judge: Uses AI to evaluate the response

llmJudge.title: AI Review Configuration
llmJudge.providerHint: Select which AI provider to use for evaluation. Leave as default to use your primary provider.
llmJudge.promptTemplatePlaceholder:
Write the prompt that will evaluate the output...

Available variables: {{input}}, {{output}}

playground.title: Test this Check
playground.outputPlaceholder: Enter the AI response to evaluate...

selector.title: Select Quality Checks
selector.description: Choose which checks to run on this prompt's outputs
selector.noGraders: No quality checks available. Create one in the Quality Checks section.
